comment_body:
If you still love yourself then you’re not self aware enough to be cured for real.

"I know I’m a piece of shit but I love myself" is just aware that you have a disorder 

But do you sit down and think how crazy and weird your behavior is? The things you say, what triggers you, how you can’t stand someone changing the subject when you’re talking..?

Me mirroring people is the least of my problems being self aware

Try focusing on your behavior first and foremost
